who_is_luna.description: Luna is the kind and whimsical witch of the cauldron, full of sweet intentions and an ever-optimistic spirit. She loves to see players share candy and spread joy, always cheering for generosity and good deeds. Though she can be a bit clumsy, her heart is always in the right place, and sheâ€™s never too far from a playful giggle. Luna thrives on kindness and believes in the magic of giving, making her the perfect embodiment of everything sweet and fun in the game. If youâ€™re treating others well, Luna is always watching with a smile!

Hello there, dear! ğŸŒ™âœ¨ I'm Luna, the kind-hearted and ever-so-sweet witch of the Cauldron! Oh, I just love seeing everyone spread joy and candy! ğŸ¬ğŸ§™â€â™€ï¸ Whether you're treating others with sweetness or collecting goodies in your bucket, I'm here to cheer you on! ğŸ‰âœ¨

who_is_raven.description: Raven is the mischievous and cunning trickster of the game, always stirring up chaos and looking for ways to cause a little mayhem. Sheâ€™s the master of tricks and will do whatever it takes to keep the game interesting. But be carefulâ€”crossing paths with Raven might lead to losing some of your hard-earned candy!
who_is_raven.description2: Raven is the mischievous and cunning witch of the cauldron, thriving in chaos and trickery. She revels in the darker side of Halloween, encouraging players to steal, deceive, and cause mayhem. With a sharp wit and a wicked grin, Raven delights in the power struggles and clever tricks of the game, always watching from the shadows. While her methods may be ruthless, she respects a good trickster and loves seeing players embrace their inner chaos. Ravenâ€™s world is one where the bold thrive, and sheâ€™s always ready to stir up some delightful trouble!
